p: Given that we have looked in more detail at health-related algorithms it is worth noting that the NHS has a code of conduct for data driven technologies [ 35]. The code consists of 12 sections: (1) how to operate ethically, (2) have a clear value proposition, (3) usability and accessibility, (4) technical assurance, (5) clinical safety, (6) data protection, (7) data transparency, (8) cybersecurity, (9) regulation, (10) interoperability and open standards, (11) generate evidence that the product achieves clinical, social, economic or behavioural benefits and (12) define the commercial strategy.
